subject: Basketball (College)
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Gola, still the Division I record-holder in career rebounds, led La Salle to the National Invitation Tournament title in 1952 and the N.C.A.A. title in 1954 before helping the Philadelphia Warriors to the N.B.A. title in 1956.
snippet: Gola, still the Division I record-holder in career rebounds, led La Salle to the National Invitation Tournament title in 1952 and the N.C.A.A. title in 1954 before helping the Philadelphia Warriors to the N.B.A. title in 1956.
